page.title: 02Riccall Mine.
page.content: At{Riccall}mine there are 400 people (mineworkers). The pit was opened 3rd of October 1983. The shaft is 850m deep. It has a lot of facilities eg.showers,a canteen and lockers for workers' clothes.There are 2 cages down to the bottom. Each cage holds 150 men at a time. Coal does not come out here,it travels by conveyer belt under ground from there to{Gascoine Wood}Mine. From there it goes to the power station by rail to supply electricity. The coal seams are very thick and the mine should be productive for many years. There are three shifts: nights, afternoons and days. Riccall mine is part of the new {Selby Coal Field.}
